Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.


Home

About

Tags

Feed

APIs.json

    DOP Juvenile Supervision Intakes by Calendar Year

    The number of youths sentenced to probation supervision during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Supervision Intakes by Fiscal Year

    The number of youths sentenced to probation supervision during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Rearrest Rate (Monthly Average)

    The number of juvenile probationers rearrested divided by the number supervised during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Rearrest Rate (Monthly Average)

    The number of juvenile probationers rearrested divided by the number supervised during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Probationers Rearrested As A Percentage Of NYPD Arrest Report (Monthly Average)

    The percentage of juvenile probationer arrests relative to all arrests recorded by the Police Department during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Probationers Rearrested As A Percentage Of NYPD Arrest Report (Monthly Average)

    The percentage of juvenile probationer arrests relative to all arrests recorded by the Police Department during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Investigations by Fiscal Year

    The number of presentence investigation reports completed for juveniles during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Investigations by Fiscal Year

    The number of presentence investigation reports completed for juveniles during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Investigations by Calendar Year

    The number of presentence investigation reports completed for juveniles during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Investigations Assigned

    The number of investigation reports assigned for juveniles during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Investigations Assigned

    The number of investigation reports assigned for juveniles during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Intakes by Fiscal Year

    The number of youth received in probation intake (pre-adjudication services) during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Intakes by Fiscal Year

    The number of youth received in probation intake (pre-adjudication services) during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Intakes by Calendar Year

    The number of youth received in probation intake (pre-adjudication services) during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Intakes by Calendar Year

    The number of youth received in probation intake (pre-adjudication services) during the reporting period.

    DOP Juvenile Cases Snapshot by Calendar Year

    The number of active juvenile probation supervision cases on the last day of the reporting period (December 31)

    DOP Juvenile Cases Snapshot by Fiscal Year

    The number of active juvenile probation supervision cases on the last day of the reporting period (June 30)

    DOP Juvenile Cases Snapshot by Calendar Year

    The number of active juvenile probation supervision cases on the last day of the reporting period (December 31)

    DOP Juvenile Case Closings By Reason

    The number of juvenile case closings by reason: Maximum Expiration Date (MED), Death, Early Discharge (ED), Revoked, Other, during the reporting period.
